T02D2651:300a-3: sku khrus gyi cho ga / dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D2651:300a-4: dang po rnal 'byor pa man ngag thob pas rdzogs pa'i rnal 'byor dang ldan pas /
T02D2651:300a-5: rang dang gzhan gyi ngo bo thob pa'i phyir bsod
T02D2651:300a-6: nams 'byung ba'i sangs rgyas la sku khrus gsol bar
T02D2651:300a-7: bya'o // de la 'di'i cho ga ni /
T02D2651:300a-8: ci 'byor zhing gang thob pa'i me tog bdug pa mar me dri mchog zhal zas dang /
T02D2651:300a-9: na bza' rgyan sogs mchod yon bum par 'bru lnga ni nas gro so ba til sran ma /
T02D2651:300b-1: yungs kar dang star ka shri pha la go yu dz'a ti pha la la sogs pa dang /
T02D2651:300b-2: sman lnga ni ha sa de ba kanda ka ri
T02D2651:300b-3: gri ha de ba ba la mu tra la sogs
T02D2651:300b-4: pa dang / dri zhim po'i sman dang dri zhim po'i mar khu mar zho dang 'o ma dang /
T02D2651:300b-5: ma su ra'i phye ma dang /
T02D2651:300b-7: dar kha dog lnga pa'i 'phan dpyangs la bum pa byin gyis brlab pa'i rim pa bya'o //
T02D2651:300b-9: mdun du gang yin pa'i kha dog la sogs pas mandala bya'o //
T02D2651:300b-10: g-yas su ci 'byor pa'i rdzas bzhag la /
T02D2651:300b-11: de nas manda la sngon du bum pa bcu'am lnga'am
T02D2651:300b-12: gcig gi nang du srog chags med pa'i dri zhim
T02D2651:300b-13: po'i chus yongs su gang ba 'bru dang bri ha
T02D2651:300b-14: de ba la sogs pa gos phrog can gyis mgrin
T02D2651:300b-15: pa bcings la / g-yon du snod cig yang dag par gzhag go //
T02D2651:300b-16: mchod yon gyi snong [*snod?] dri zhim po'i chu dang
T02D2651:300b-17: zho dang bo ga ling dang sman dang yungs kar
T02D2651:300b-18: dang ko su ma dang go yu rnams yang dag
T02D2651:300b-19: par bshams la / yi dam gyi lha'i sngags nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas la /
T02D2651:300b-20: de nas las thams cad pa'i snod g-yas su dri zhim pa'i chus yongs su gang ba gzhag go //
T02D2651:300b-21: bdud rtsi 'khyil ba'i sngags kyang bzlas te'o //
T02D2651:300b-22: de nas rnam par rgyal ba'i bum par zla ba rdo rje la sogs pa'am /
T02D2651:300b-23: skad cig mas bsgom pa'i rim pas rdzogs par bya'o //
T02D2651:300b-24: padma lnga la h'um gyur pa las rdo rje h'um
T02D2651:300b-25: gis mtshan pa las 'od kyis de bzhin gshegs pa
T02D2651:300b-26: gzhug par bya'o // de zhu bas bcom ldan 'das
T02D2651:300b-27: rdo rje 'dzin pa dkar po zhal gcig phyag gnyis
T02D2651:300b-28: gzhug par bya'o // pa / rdo rje dril bu bsgying bas 'dzin pa /
T02D2651:300b-29: rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa /
T02D2651:300b-30: snying gar zla ba rdo rje h'um gi rnam pa'o //
T02D2651:300b-31: yi ge gsum gyis byin gyis brlab bo //
T02D2651:300b-32: mi bskyod pa'i dbu rgyan bsam gtan bya'o //
T02D2651:300b-33: de bzhin du bum pa rnam par snang mdzad /
T02D2651:300b-35: snang ba mtha' yas don yod grub pa /
T02D2651:300b-39: sgrol ma bdud rtsi 'khyil pa mtha' mar rdzogs pa
T02D2651:300b-40: ni phyag gnyis pa zhal gcig pa rang gi mchan
T02D2651:300b-41: ma 'dzin pa / rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa /
T02D2651:300b-42: rang gi sa bon dang mtshan ma las nyi ma'i
T02D2651:300b-43: dkyil 'khor la g-yon brkyang ba'i bdud rtsi 'khyil pa
T02D2651:300b-44: sdigs mdzub dang rdo rje bsor ba bsgom mo //
T02D2651:300b-45: yi ge brgya pa lan gsum brjod cing sor mo'i rdo rje dang /
T02D2651:301a-0: @301a * // yi ge gsum gyi me tog la sogs pas yang dag par mchod de /
T02D2651:301a-1: de nas dril bu'i sngags kyis mchod /
T02D2651:301a-4: aom badzra ghanda ra na ra na pra ran pra
T02D2651:301a-5: ra na sam pra ra na sam pra ra na
T02D2651:301a-6: / sarba buddha kshe tra pra tsa li ta ma
T02D2651:301a-7: h'a pra dzny'a p'a ra mi t'a sra bh'a ba
T02D2651:301a-8: bi shuddhe badzra hri da ya santo sha ni h'um
T02D2651:301a-10: de nyid g-yas pa'i sor mos rdo rje dang spos khang bzung la g-yon pas dril bu dkrol lo //
T02D2651:301a-11: yi ge brgya pa lan gsum brjod do //
T02D2651:301a-12: aom badzra dhri ka a'a: h'um sv'a h'a /
T02D2651:301a-13: aom dzi na dzi ka a'a: h'um sv'a h'a /
T02D2651:301a-14: aom ratna dhri ka a'a: h'um sv'a h'a /
T02D2651:301a-15: aom a'a ro li ka a'a: h'um sv'a h'a /
T02D2651:301a-16: aom badzra dhrika a'a: sv'a h'a /
T02D2651:301a-17: aom ru ru spu ru dzra la tishtha siddha lo tsa ni sarba aartha s'a dha ni sv'a h'a /
T02D2651:301a-18: aom sham ka ri sh'intam ka ri go tra ni ga te ga te ku tra ni sv'a h'a /
T02D2651:301a-19: aom ka te bi ka te ni ka ti ka ro ti bi ri sv'a h'a /
T02D2651:301a-20: aom t'a re tutt'a re tu re sv'a h'a /
T02D2651:301a-21: na ma: sa manta k'a ya b'a ka tsitt'a badzr'a n'a na mo /
T02D2651:301a-22: badzra kro dh'a ya ma h'a dam shtrotka ta bhee
T02D2651:301a-23: ra w'a ya aa si mu sal pa ra shu
T02D2651:301a-25: aom badzra aa mri ta kunda li kha kha kh'a hi kh'a hi /
T02D2651:301a-32: bi spho ta ya sarba bi ghn'am bi n'a ya
T02D2651:301a-33: kam ma h'a ga na pa ti dz'i ba t'inta
T02D2651:301a-34: ka ra ya h'um h'um phat sv'a h'a /
T02D2651:301a-35: 'di ni spyan drang pa'i sngags so //
T02D2651:301a-36: de nas sngags 'di rim pa ji lta bar rnam
T02D2651:301a-37: par gyal ba la sogs pa'i bum par mchod yon
T02D2651:301a-38: me tog la sogs pa sbyin no //
T02D2651:301a-39: sngon du brjod pa'i dril bu dkrol zhing sbyin no //
T02D2651:301a-40: snang gsal mar me dri mchog zhal zas kyis gang ba'i snod sbyin no //
T02D2651:301a-41: de nas g-yon pa'i dril bu dkur brten la g-yas
T02D2651:301a-42: pa'i sor mo rdo rje dang bcas pa'i rtse gsum
T02D2651:301a-43: pa'i phyag rgya bum pa'i steng du yang dag par
T02D2651:301a-44: bzhag la yang me tog la sogs pas mchod do
T02D2651:301a-45: // zhu ba'i bsam gtan gyi bum pa byin gyis brlab po //
T02D2651:301a-46: de nas thang sku la sogs pa la bcom ldan
T02D2651:301a-47: 'das ma'i yi ge gsum gyis byin gyis brlabs par
T02D2651:301a-48: bsam mo // khrus kyi las kyi yo byad dang ;
T02D2651:301a-49: shis pa'i chog ni snod kyi stegs gru gsum pa'i shing bzhag la /
T02D2651:301a-50: de'i gru la chang pa gnyis dang me'i snod dang mar me gsum bzhag la sngon du g-yas /
T02D2651:301a-51: yungs kar las bdud rtsi 'khyil pa'i sngags kyis mngon par bsngags te /
T02D2651:301a-52: aom sarba p'a pam da ha na badzr'a ya sv'a h'a /
T02D2651:301b-0: sngags 'dis @301b me'i nang du blugs la bdud rtsi
T02D2651:301b-1: 'khyil pa'i sngags kyis bsnyen la lan gsum bskor te
T02D2651:301b-3: bsang gtor gyis khrus bya ba'i thabs ni /
T02D2651:301b-4: de bzhin du me tog la sogs pa la bdud rtsi 'khyil pa'i bsang gtor gyis gtor te /
T02D2651:301b-5: bsang gtor gyis me long legs par phyis la /
T02D2651:301b-6: aom 'di ni bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa
T02D2651:301b-7: dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
T02D2651:301b-8: ni / rig pa dang ni zhabs su ldan //
T02D2651:301b-9: bde bar gshegs pa 'jig rten mkhyen //
T02D2651:301b-10: bla na med pa'i skyes bu dang //
T02D2651:301b-11: 'dul ba'i kha los sgyur ba dang //
T02D2651:301b-12: lha dang mi yi ston pa ni //
T02D2651:301b-13: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das nyid do //
T02D2651:301b-14: de dag la 'dir mchod pa'i rdzas rnams dang /
T02D2651:301b-15: khrus kyi yo byad thams cad thogs te sngon du mchod pa lngas mchod do //
T02D2651:301b-16: rim pas 'dag pa'i tshal dang so shing dang bum pa'i chus bkru'o //
T02D2651:301b-17: zho dang 'o ma dang 'bru lnga dang po ga
T02D2651:301b-18: ling dang star ka la sogs pa'i 'bras bu dang
T02D2651:301b-19: / sman lnga dang de bzhin du sman thams cad dang /
T02D2651:301b-20: rin po che dang gur kum dang dri bzangs thams cad do //
T02D2651:301b-21: der rdzas rnams te bum pa'i chus bkru'o //
T02D2651:301b-22: aom rang gi rdzas dang sna na p'u dza me
T02D2651:301b-23: gha sa mu dra spha ra na sa ma ye
T02D2651:301b-26: aom sarba ta th'a ga ta k'a ya bi sho dha ni sv'a h'a /
T02D2651:301b-28: las thams cad pa'i bum pas bya'o //
T02D2651:301b-29: de nas lha la dbang bskur chen po bya ste /
T02D2651:301b-30: bdud rtsi 'khyil pa'i sngags phreng rnams dang /
T02D2651:301b-31: de bzhin gshegs pa dang lha mo'i sngags brjod cing /
T02D2651:301b-32: de bzhin bltams pa rtsom dus su //
T02D2651:301b-33: lha rnams kyis ni khrus gsol ltar //
T02D2651:301b-34: lha yi chu ni dag pa yis //
T02D2651:301b-35: bdag gis de bzhin khrus bya'o //
T02D2651:301b-37: yang dag par rgyal ba'i bum pa la me tog la sogs pas mchod de /
T02D2651:301b-38: yi ge brgya pa dang de bzhin du badzra dhri ka la sogs pa dang /
T02D2651:301b-39: aom sarba ta th'a ga ta aa bhi she ka sa ma ye hri bi h'um /
T02D2651:301b-41: de nas dri zhim po'i bdug pa la ras dag pas bdug ste /
T02D2651:301b-42: me long gi chu dag par bya'o //
T02D2651:301b-43: dri zhim pa'i rdzas kyis me long la mandala lnga'i mtshan ma byas te /
T02D2651:301b-44: der me tog bzhag ste gzhug par bya'o //
T02D2651:301b-45: dril bu dang bdug spos thogs ta sngon du mchod
T02D2651:302a-0: pa'i bdug pa dang me tog la sogs pas @302a
T02D2651:302a-1: * // mchod pa bya ste lha bshos kyi snod dbul lo //
T02D2651:302a-2: yi dam gyi lha'i dkyil 'khor gyi rim pa la
T02D2651:302a-3: zhal zas la sogs pa'i mchod pa phul la gtor
T02D2651:302a-4: ma sbyin no // bstod pas bstod de me tog dor te gzhag go //
T02D2651:302a-5: sems can gyi don du bsod nams bsngo'o //
T02D2651:302a-6: de nas gshegs su gsol lo /
T02D2651:302a-9: // / pandi ta sa ra he ta dang /
